metadata.title: CVE-2013-0237 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Plupload.as in Moxiecodeplupload before 1.5.5, as used in WordPress before 3.5.1 and otherproducts, allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTMLvia the id parameter.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-0237` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

wordpress - 3.5.1+dfsg-2
wordpress-l10n - 3.5.1+dfsg-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: wordpress package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.1+dfsg-2').
